title: NRRI Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Graduate Assistant and Other Posts
description: The National Rice Research Institute (NRRI) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 04 Graduate Assistants, Agricultural Field Operator Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in Any Degree, 12th, or Diploma can grab this chance and apply for the NRRI Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend th...
